item.title: Students Divided Over Opt-In Union Membership
item.description: A February 2025 poll of students reveals 36.7 % favour an optional TCDSU with an undecided quarter leaving support for the union in the balance.

item.title: Poll: Social Democrats maintain huge lead as most popular party among Trinity students
item.description: The party have been most popular for five years according to polling by Trinity News

item.title: Poll projects RON result in TCDSU presidential election
item.description: A poll conducted by Trinity News found that the vote for RON may be twice as high as any other candidate

item.title: Poll: RON campaign sees major upward momentum even as Oâ€™Leary leads
item.description: John Garvey leads the race for welfare officer, while Ents remains too close to call

item.title: Using Copulas to Model Prepayment and Default in Competing Risks Analysis
item.description: As part of a group project, we produced a report evaluating how effectively copulas model competing risks in loan data.

item.title: An Extended Mixture of Experts Model for Rank Data: Insights from Irish Elections
Sampling Plackett-Luce Distributions to Study Condorcet Paradoxes in Ranked-Choice Voting
item.description: The report from my research internship that I completed Summer 2024
